trans-unit.source: Represents a disk extent that contains log data.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en disk omfanget som inneholder dataene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> instance stores its data in a collection of disk extents, represented by LogExtent instances.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>forekomsten lagrer dataene i en samling av disk-omfang, angitt av LogExtent forekomster.</xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>

trans-unit.source: A particular LogExtent is associated with exactly one <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>, and LogExtent objects in the same <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> are of identical size.
trans-unit.target: En bestemt LogExtent er knyttet til nøyaktig én <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>, og LogExtent objekter i samme <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>av identiske størrelse.</xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> </xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>

trans-unit.source: Space is added to and removed from a <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore> instance in extent increments.
trans-unit.target: Plass legges til og fjernes fra en <xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>forekomst i omfanget intervaller.</xref:System.IO.Log.LogStore>

trans-unit.source: Although LogExtent objects are represented on disk as files, they should not be moved or deleted as normal files.
trans-unit.target: Selv om LogExtent objekter representeres som filer på disk, må de ikke være flyttet eller slettet som vanlige filer.

trans-unit.source: To delete a LogExtent instance, remove it from the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtentCollection> that contains it.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil slette en forekomst av LogExtent, fjernes fra <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtentCollection>som inneholder det.</xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtentCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the fully qualified path of this <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter den fullstendige banen til dette <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Although <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtent> objects are represented on disk as files, they should not be moved or deleted as normal files.
trans-unit.target: Selv om <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtent>objekter representeres som filer på disk, de må ikke være flyttet eller slettet som vanlige filer.</xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtent>

trans-unit.source: To delete a <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtent> instance, remove it from the <xref:System.IO.Log.LogExtentCollection> that contains it.
The fully qualified path of this <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Den fullstendige banen til dette <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of this <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"></xref> instance, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Henter størrelsen på dette <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"> </xref> forekomsten, i byte.

trans-unit.source: The size of this <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"></xref> instance, in bytes.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på dette <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"> </xref> forekomsten, i byte.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of this <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for dette <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The state of this <xref href="System.IO.Log.LogExtent"></xref> instance.
